features.title: Why Choose TeacherMatcher?

feature1.title: Verified Teachers

feature2.title: Easy Matching

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Getting started with TeacherMatcher is simple. Follow these four easy steps to find your perfect match.

step1.title: Create Profile
step1.description: Sign up and create your detailed profile as a teacher or company.

step2.title: Find Matches
step2.description: Search and filter through profiles to find the perfect match.

step3.title: Connect
step3.description: Start conversations and discuss opportunities with potential matches.

step4.title: Collaborate
step4.description: Agree on terms and start your educational partnership.

readyToStart.title: Ready to Get Started?
readyToStart.subtitle: Join thousands of teachers and companies already using TeacherMatcher.

footer.description: Connecting qualified teachers with companies worldwide. Find the perfect match for your educational needs or discover amazing teaching opportunities.
